Upcoming Tests

Monday  February 2nd - Chapter 4 test - Government, Landmarks and Symbols
Reading

Read and complete the AR quizzes for your library book!

Tomorrow during study hall time, please add these items to your Literary Fair board after they have been checked by the teacher: the main picture, setting, main characters, and plot.  

Please watch the video of this weeks story.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rGX67yYNsJk

Prepare for the spelling test next Friday

I will be giving grades for the readworks participation. Please log in and complete the reading passages.

Please make sure students log in to ReadWorks and complete the assigned stories. New passages have been added that link closely to our class learning.  

ReadWorks login:

www.readworks.org/student

Class code: YU6GQ2

Password: [REDACTED] (unless already changed)

Math

Complete Additional Practice 9-5 student book and homework book.

I have added new Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please try to have your child practise a little Khan Academy maths each night using

https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E

as this will help strengthen their overall maths skills.

I have noticed that some students are not logging in or completing any work yet.

It is important that they try to log in regularly and complete some activities so they can continue to improve their maths.

Social Studies

Prepare for the test

1) Look over the book pages 138-180

2) Try the blooket with similar questions to the test.

https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=6979876b001f0082f3a6ce93

Chinese 

Complete the worksheet given in class today! Login and practice on the Chinese website.

Korean
42-47

Spanish

Write the numbers in Spanish and their favorite thing.

Language Arts

Complete Pages 102-103

Literary Fair

I have checked the plots for five students. I still need to check the remaining four so we can continue working on the boards.

Please keep completing your board. Finish the artwork and glue it onto the board, along with the main characters and the setting.

Be ready to add your work to the board tomorrow. The picture should go in the middle, with the information for the setting, plot, and main characters.
